description: Specification for the asset.json file for rocket fonts
title: Rocket font asset.json spec

___font_file.description: path to a ttf or otf font file

___font_style.description: The overrided font style. Required if rcss_name is supplied.

___rcss_name.description: The name of the font family to use in RCSS, extracted from the file by default.

___font_weight.description: The overrided font weight. Required if rcss_name is supplied.
